description: Faced with mounting unrest, a private access panel goes live showing the dormant ballot protocol and the erased logs. Oksana hesitates—recalling Alex's warnings about dead ends—then selects the path to activate the citizen ballot, suppressing traces of her authorization.
Encrypted invitations arrive in Halden Zones, prompting people to rank core values. Whispers of a 'Shadow Ballot' spread; curiosity and tension build as the BCI begins to visibly shift in response.
